## Why These Resources Matter

**Product-Focused Learning**\
Every tutorial is designed specifically for Orebit applications, ensuring you can immediately apply what you learn.

**Real-World Workflows**\
Guides based on actual geological projects, not theoretical examples. Learn workflows that work in production environments.

**Progressive Difficulty**\
Start with basics and progress to advanced techniques. Each guide builds on previous knowledge.

**Open Source Philosophy**\
All code examples and workflows are transparent, reproducible, and freely available.
